name: Sweety (serafimkvashnin)
description:
Feed that little bastard!

Seriously, just look at that cute and tiny creature. Do not you want to feed him? So do I!

This is my first published game. I would appreciate every feedback and newcomer. Don't take it seriously but if you do then explain your complaint. 

If you have any ideas or suggestions feel free to contact me =)

How to play

Left click - Spawn candy
Right click - Open/Close menu
Shift + G - Reset game
Shift + T - Reset time
Shift + R - Reset all

Some game info 

Newbie multiplier comes from your current position in scores list and it only 
affects time bonus. (newbie * time_bonus)

Newbie and time bonuses affects your passive income. (gen_income + newbie * time_bonus)

Saves are cross-platform. Play this game on Kongregate!
